import React,{useEffect}from"react";// ✅ นำเข้า useEffect ด้วย
import AOS from"aos";import"aos/dist/aos.css";import Navbar from"./components/Navbar";import Header from"./components/Header";import About from"./components/About";import Projects from"./components/Projects";import Contact from"./components/Contact";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import BackToTop from"./components/BackToTop";import Preloader from"./components/Preloader";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){useEffect(()=>{AOS.init({duration:800});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"scroll-smooth bg-gray-900 text-white min-h-screen overflow-x-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Preloader,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"scroll-mt-24",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"about",className:"scroll-mt-24",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"contact",className:"scroll-mt-24",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contact,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BackToTop,{})]});}export default App;
